import XCTest

class UserInfoActivityIT: XCTestCase {

    func fullUserInfoDetail() {
        let intent = Intent(context: targetContext, activityClass: UserInfoActivity.self)
        intent.putExtra(key: UserInfoActivity.KEY_ACCOUNT, value: user)
        
        let userInfo = UserInfo(username: "test",
                                isActive: true,
                                fullName: "Firstname Familyname",
                                email: "oss@rocks.com",
                                phone: "+49 7613 672 255",
                                address: "Awesome Place Av.",
                                website: "https://www.nextcloud.com",
                                organization: "nextclouders",
                                additionalInfo1: nil,
                                additionalInfo2: nil)
        
        intent.putExtra(key: UserInfoActivity.KEY_USER_DATA, value: userInfo)
        let sut = activityRule.launchActivity(intent: intent)

        shortSleep()
        shortSleep()

        screenshot(activity: sut)
    }
}
